[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [TileDataAccessor](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.md)

## TileDataAccessor class

An accessor for all geometries in a tile. This class uses a client-provided \[\[ITileDataVisitor\]\] to visit all objects, based on filtering options specified by both, the `TileDataAccessor` and the visitor itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TileDataAccessor 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(tile, visitor, options)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a <code>TileDataAccessor</code> instance. |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [tile](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.tile.md) |  | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getBufferGeometry(object)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.getbuffergeometry.md) |  | Gets the <code>BufferGeometry</code> from the specified object. This function requires the attribute <code>position</code> in <code>BufferGeometry</code> to be set. |
|  [getGeometryAccessor(geometryType, object, bufferGeometry)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.getgeometryaccessor.md) |  | Obtains an accessor for the nonindexed geometry. This function may return <code>undefined</code> if the accessor is not implemented. |
|  [getIndexedGeometryAccessor(geometryType, object, bufferGeometry)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.getindexedgeometryaccessor.md) |  | Obtains an accessor for the indexed geometry. This function may return <code>undefined</code> if the accessor is not implemented. |
|  [visitAll()](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.visitall.md) |  | Calls the visitor on all objects in the tile. |
|  [visitMesh(meshObject, featureData)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.visitmesh.md) |  | Visit the object. |
|  [visitObject(object)](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.visitobject.md) |  | Visits a single object. This function should normally be called during visiting. |
